pyqgis_plugin.name: QuickWKT
pyqgis_plugin.description: Quick WKT/WKB viewer, this Qgis Plugin opens a dialog where the user can paste (E)WKT and WKB code and see it on the map. Pasted data are stored in a temporay (memory) layer and are completely lost when the user quits QGIS.
pyqgis_plugin.about: Quick WKT/WKB is a plugin to easily show WKT/WKB data into QGIS. It also provides some utilities function and adds them to iface (see the about tab in the plugin's dialog for details).

pyqgis_plugin.name: Memory Layer Saver
pyqgis_plugin.description: Makes memory layers persistent
pyqgis_plugin.about: Makes memory layers persistent so that they are restored when a project is closed and reopened. The memory provider data is streamed in a portable binary format (QDataStream) and embedded in the project attachments (inside the qgz archive, or in attachments.zip for unzipped projects).
pyqgis_plugin.author_name: Chris Crook, Yoann Quenach de Quivillic

pyqgis_plugin.name: SimpleSvg
pyqgis_plugin.description: Create simple SVG from current view, editable with Inkscape
pyqgis_plugin.about: Create simple SVG from current view, editable with Inkscape. Only for simple styling and data. In QGIS3 there is better support for SVG

pyqgis_plugin.name: Value Tool
pyqgis_plugin.description: Qgis plugin to display in table or plot values from raster layers (or mesh layers, from version 3.0.5) at the current mouse position

pyqgis_plugin.name: GeoCoding
pyqgis_plugin.description: GeoCoding and reverse GeoCoding using Nominatim and Google web services
pyqgis_plugin.about: This plugin allows the user to search for an address and get its coordinates (geocoding) using GeoCoding using Nominatim and Google web services. It also allows to get the address of a point by clicking on the map canvas (reverse geocoding).

pyqgis_plugin.name: Group Stats
pyqgis_plugin.description: Stats and analysis for vector layers data
pyqgis_plugin.about:
Migrated to QGIS 3 version by Faunalia. Sponsored by Arpa Piemonte for ERIKUS program in collaboration with Regione Piemonte e Dipartimento della Protezione Civile - Funzione Censimento Danni
Migrato alla versione QGIS3 da Faunalia per Arpa Piemonte per il programma ERIKUS in collaborazione con Regione Piemonte e Dipartimento della Protezione Civile - Funzione Censimento Danni
pyqgis_plugin.author_name: Rajmund Szostok. Migrated to QGIS 3 by Borys Jurgiel and Faunalia. Code translated to English by Henrik Spångmyr.

pyqgis_plugin.name: TimeManager
pyqgis_plugin.description: Create animations visualizing spatio-temporal data
pyqgis_plugin.about: TimeManager adds time controls to QGIS. Using these time controls, you can animate vector features based on a time attribute. There is also an experimental raster layer support and support for interpolation beween point geometries. You can create animations directly in the map window and export image series.
pyqgis_plugin.author_name: Anita Graser, Karolina Alexiou (aka carolinux), Seyed Javad Adabikhsoh

pyqgis_plugin.name: Layers menu from project
pyqgis_plugin.description: Build layers shortcuts menus based on QGIS projects
pyqgis_plugin.about: Allow easy opening of layers maintaining their style.
pyqgis_plugin.author_name: Xavier Culos (Agence de l'eau Adour Garonne), Etienne Trimaille, Julien M. (Oslandia)

pyqgis_plugin.name: Hotlink
pyqgis_plugin.description: Triggers actions on single click to facilitate the use of actions attached to vector layers
pyqgis_plugin.about: When the plugin is activated (button in the toolbar), the objects "carriers" of actions become "clickable".
pyqgis_plugin.author_name: Xavier Culos (Agence de l'eau Adour Garonne)

pyqgis_plugin.name: GarminCustomMap
pyqgis_plugin.description: Export the current map canvas to a Garmin Custom Map (.kmz-file)
pyqgis_plugin.about: The GarminCustomMap plugin exports the current map canvas to a .kmz-file, which is compatible with Garmin`s Custom Maps format for handheld GPS units. That way individual maps styled in QGIS can be used as background (raster) maps on the compatible Garmin GPS units, like Alpha, Astro, Dakota, Oregon, Colorado, GPSMAP 62 series, GPSMAP 64 series, GPSMAP 78 series, Edge 800, Montana, Rino, eTrex® 20 and 30.
pyqgis_plugin.author_name: Stefan Blumentrath - Norwegian Institute for Nature Research (NINA)

pyqgis_plugin.name: Load Them All
pyqgis_plugin.description: Loads files stored in a directory structure recursively, based on several filters
pyqgis_plugin.about: QGIS plugin that recursively loads vector and raster layers stored in a directory structure, based on several filters.

pyqgis_plugin.name: Remove empty layers from the map
pyqgis_plugin.description: 'Cleans' the layer list widget (legend) by removing empty layers
pyqgis_plugin.about: 'Cleans' the layer list widget (legend) by removing empty layers

pyqgis_plugin.name: Mask
pyqgis_plugin.description: Help to create mask, filter labels in it
pyqgis_plugin.about: This plugin allows user to quickly transform a polygon selection into a map masking layer or a region of interest, following symbology choice. The plugin allows also to spatially filter labeling of other layer, so that labels will only appear in the Region of Interest.
pyqgis_plugin.author_name: Hugo Mercier (github.com - mhugo) - Xavier Culos (Agence de l'eau Adour Garonne) - Régis Haubourg (github.com - haubourg)

pyqgis_plugin.name: Dimensioning
pyqgis_plugin.description: This plugin creates a Memory Layer with style for dimensioning
pyqgis_plugin.about: This plugin creates a Memory Layer with style for dimensioning. If you want to save the dimensioning make the Memory Layer permanent or use the plugin "Memory Layer Saver".

pyqgis_plugin.name: Lizmap
pyqgis_plugin.description: Publish and share your QGIS maps on the Web via Lizmap Web Client, by 3liz.com
pyqgis_plugin.about: With a few clicks, it's possible to publish and share your QGIS projects on the Web via Lizmap Web Client, by 3liz.com. QGIS Server is used in the background so all the symbology is kept. The edition forms in QGIS are also available. Demo : https://demo.lizmap.com and documentation : https://docs.lizmap.com and hosting solutions https://lizmap.com

pyqgis_plugin.name: MultiEdit
pyqgis_plugin.description: MultiEdit chooses an attribute value from a vector layer and selecting the matching features, changes all the corresponding to a new value: useful if you have many features to modify.This plugin lets you write the new value in any existing field in the attribute table, for the selected features or newly created from plugin gui...
pyqgis_plugin.about: MultiEdit plugin version for 3.x Qgis release

pyqgis_plugin.name: Profile tool
pyqgis_plugin.description: Plots terrain profile
pyqgis_plugin.about: This tool plots profile lines from raster layers or point vector layer with elevation field. Supports multiple lines as well as graph export to svg, pdf, png or csv file. Supports 3D polyline export to dxf.
pyqgis_plugin.author_name: Borys Jurgiel - Patrice Verchere - Etienne Tourigny - Javier Becerra

pyqgis_plugin.name: Midvatten
pyqgis_plugin.description: A toolset that makes QGIS an interface for editing/viewing hydrogeological observational data (drillings, water levels, seismic data etc) stored in a sqlite db.
pyqgis_plugin.about: The plugin is a toolset for using QGIS to manage observational data from hydrogeological investigations. Data is stored in a spatialite database.

pyqgis_plugin.name: qNote
pyqgis_plugin.description: Save notes in QGIS projects
pyqgis_plugin.about: qNote is plugin for saving text notes in QGIS project files, basic HTML-formatting and hyperlinks are supported

pyqgis_plugin.name: mmqgis
pyqgis_plugin.description: A collection of QGIS vector layer operation plugins
pyqgis_plugin.about: MMQGIS is a set of Python plugins for manipulating vector map layers in Quantum GIS: CSV input/output/join, geocoding, geometry conversion, buffering, hub analysis, simplification, column modification, and simple animation. MMQGIS provides an alternative to the Processing toolbox, with verbose progress reporting, an intuitive user interface, direct shapefile/CSV-file access, and some additional capabilities missing from other plugin sets.

pyqgis_plugin.name: WFS 2.0 Client
pyqgis_plugin.description: Client for OGC Web Feature Service 2.0
pyqgis_plugin.about: Client for OGC Web Feature Service 2.0. Best used in combination with the ComplexGmlInfo Plugin (experimental).
pyqgis_plugin.author_name: Juergen Weichand, Tim Vinzing, Edward Nash

pyqgis_plugin.name: Plugin Reloader
pyqgis_plugin.description: Reloads a chosen plugin in one click
pyqgis_plugin.about: This tool is only useful for Python Plugin Developers!

pyqgis_plugin.name: MultiQml
pyqgis_plugin.description: Apply a style from a QML file to multiple raster or vector layers
pyqgis_plugin.about: Select an existing QML style file to apply it to multiple raster or vector layers to make them appear to be the same. Developed by NextGIS. Any feedback is welcome at https://nextgis.com/contact

pyqgis_plugin.name: Quickly save default QML
pyqgis_plugin.description: Save default QML in one click
pyqgis_plugin.about: Save default QML for a layer or layers in one click. Developed by NextGIS. Any feedback is welcome at https://nextgis.com/contact

pyqgis_plugin.name: DumpLoadField
pyqgis_plugin.description: Dump or load text values for a field
pyqgis_plugin.about: Dump or load text values from/to a selected field from/to a textfile. Developed by NextGIS. Any feedback is welcome at https://nextgis.com/contact

pyqgis_plugin.name: Join lines
pyqgis_plugin.description: Permanently join two intersecting or snapped lines. Same layer. Not to be mistaken with multiline.
pyqgis_plugin.about: Permanently join two lines

pyqgis_plugin.name: osmpoly_export
pyqgis_plugin.description: Export vector polygons to poly-files
pyqgis_plugin.about: Select a feature or export the whole layer as poly-files used by Osmosis for cliping OpenStreetMap data. Developed by NextGIS. Any feedback is welcome at https://nextgis.com/contact

pyqgis_plugin.name: PgVersion
pyqgis_plugin.description: Client for the Postgres Versioning System pgvs
pyqgis_plugin.about: Sourcepole AG - Linux & Open Source Solutions, Weberstrasse 5, 8004 Zurich, Switzerland

pyqgis_plugin.name: InaSAFE
pyqgis_plugin.description: InaSAFE is free software that allows disaster managers to study realistic natural hazard impact scenarios for better planning, preparedness and response activities.
pyqgis_plugin.about: Developed for the Indonesian Government - BNPB, Australian Government - AIFDR and DMInnovation and, and World Bank - GFDRR
pyqgis_plugin.author_name: Indonesian Government - BNPB, Australian Government and World Bank - GFDRR

pyqgis_plugin.name: Azimuth and Distance Plugin
pyqgis_plugin.description: Creates a feature from azimuths and distances
pyqgis_plugin.about: This plugin aims to help users that want to create geometries from a list of azimuths and distances, such as the description on some old land registration documents.
pyqgis_plugin.author_name: Mauricio de Paulo, Fred Laplante, DMS Australia, TechnoglogyOne, Matthew Petroff

pyqgis_plugin.name: QGIS Cloud Plugin
pyqgis_plugin.description: Publish maps on qgiscloud.com
pyqgis_plugin.about: QGIS Cloud is your powerful Web-GIS platform for publishing maps, data and services on the internet. Create and edit professional maps with all the capabilities from QGIS. With only a few short mouse-clicks you can share your work on qgiscloud.com with the public. <br><br>The documentation of QGIS Cloud can be found in <a href="https://docs.qgiscloud.com/en/">English</a> or <a href="https://docs.qgiscloud.com/de/">German</a>.
pyqgis_plugin.author_name: Sourcepole AG - Linux & Open Source Solutions, Weberstrasse 5, 8004 Zurich, Switzerland

pyqgis_plugin.name: qgSurf
pyqgis_plugin.description: Processing of geological planes and surfaces
pyqgis_plugin.about: qgSurf is a field-mapping/structural-geology plugin that can be used as an aid in: a) estimating the attitude of sub-planar geological surfaces given three or more points on a topographic surface; b) determining the intersection between a geological plane and a topographic surface; c) calculating the distance between points and a geological plane; d) plotting geological data in a stereonet; e) creating geological profiles.

pyqgis_plugin.name: DirectionalSlope
pyqgis_plugin.description: Calculates directional slope along given and variable orientations
pyqgis_plugin.about: This plugin allows to calculate directional slope along uniform or spatially-variable orientations, from a source DEM

pyqgis_plugin.name: PS Time Series Viewer
pyqgis_plugin.description: Computation and visualization of time series of speed for Permanent Scatterers derived from satellite interferometry
pyqgis_plugin.about: Computation and visualization of time series of speed for Permanent Scatterers derived from satellite interferometry

pyqgis_plugin.name: VectorFieldCalc
pyqgis_plugin.description: Calculation of vector field parameters
pyqgis_plugin.about: This plugin calculates vector field parameters (e.g., magnitude, divergence, curl) and pathlines, given two rasters representing x- and y- velocities

pyqgis_plugin.name: Point sampling tool
pyqgis_plugin.description: Samples polygon attributes and raster values from multiple layers at specified sampling points
pyqgis_plugin.about: The Point Sampling Tool Plugin collects polygon attributes and raster values from multiple layers at specified sampling points. You need a point layer with locations of sampling points and at least one polygon or raster layer to probe values from. The plugin creates a new point layer with locations given by the sampling points and attributes taken from all the underlying polygons or/and raster cells. Please use Control and Shift keys in order to select multiple columns and bands. Note this tool is not compatible with mulitipoint sources, unless each multipoint contains exactly one point. Using multipoint samples that contain more points in multipoints may produce unreliable results.

pyqgis_plugin.name: NumericalDigitize
pyqgis_plugin.description: Numerical Digitize is QGIS plugin for creating and editing features by inserting, changing or deleting numerical values of vertex's coordinates from keybord or from clipboard
pyqgis_plugin.about: Numerical Digitize append two tools to vector editing panel of QGIS. 1. First tool allow you to create new feature of current editing layer by entering numerical values of vertices from keyboard or paste it from clipboard. You can append, insert or remove vertices, add or remove parts and rings, reproject coordinates in process of create feature. 2. Second tool allow edit existing feature of current editing layer. You can perform the same operations as when creating feature. You can also copy coordinates to clipboard and then paste it in some program for creating report, by example. Detailed help file can be found at menu 'Vector'->'Numerical digitize'->'Help'

pyqgis_plugin.name: Contour plugin
pyqgis_plugin.description: Generates contours from point layer
pyqgis_plugin.about:
Generate a contour layer based on an attribute of a point vector layer.
Builds a processing plugin and a GUI interface for simple direct contouring of point layers. The source point layer Can be either gridded or randomly organised. The layer resulting contours can be rendered with a graduated renderer using a colour ramp. The layer includes properties that can be used to replicate or modify the contouring parameters.
Requires python modules numpy and matplotlib
Recommends loading the MemoryLayerSaver plugin to save the contours with the project

pyqgis_plugin.name: LecoS - Landscape Ecology Statistics
pyqgis_plugin.description: Contains several analytical functions for land cover analysis
pyqgis_plugin.about: LecoS is based on metrics taken from FRAGSTATS: http://www.umass.edu/landeco/research/fragstats/fragstats.html Functions include the calculation of metrics on rasters and vector layers. A polygon overlay tool is also available to ease up computation. Additionally LecoS provides some functionalities to manipulate classified raster images.

pyqgis_plugin.name: Crayfish
pyqgis_plugin.description: Tools for mesh layers QGIS
pyqgis_plugin.about: The Crayfish plugin contains set of advanced tool for the QGIS Mesh Layer as plots and animations.

pyqgis_plugin.name: PDOK services plugin
pyqgis_plugin.description: Plugin to easily load the available Dutch PDOK (Publieke Dienstverlening Op de Kaart) services. Currently only in Dutch.
pyqgis_plugin.about:
Nederlands:
- Plugin om eenvoudiger PDOK services (WMS, WMTS, WFS, WCS en OGC:API tiles/features) te laden in QGIS. - Vindt u dit een handige plugin? Stuur eens een (klein) Tikkie of een ASN betaling. Zie verder de 'homepage' van deze plugin: https://github.com/rduivenvoorde/pdokservicesplugin - Een paar opmerkingen: alle dataset en de url's zijn te vinden op https://www.pdok.nl/datasets - LET OP: van sommige (vooral grote) dataset worden/zijn de WFS services uitgefaseerd, en dan vervangen door een ATOM-feed. In de feed zit dan een download-url voor de gehele dataset. Die feed moet u zelf van https://www.pdok.nl/datasets ophalen.

pyqgis_plugin.name: Cxf_in
pyqgis_plugin.description: Caricatore file CXF Catasto
pyqgis_plugin.about: GEOREFERENZIAZIONE FILE CATASTALI CXF DI TUTTA L'ITALIA La necessità di registrarsi per la georeferenziazione serve a garantire la qualità del dato e a non far proliferare sistemi di georeferenziazione che farebbero confusione. La procedura di georiferimento attuale è univoca (trasformazione di datum) e riguarda in maniera omogenea tutti i fogli dell'intero del Comune di riferimento. Per migliorare la georeferenziazione all'interno del singolo Comune deve essere applicata una trasformazione per singoli fogli. La procedure di georiferimento dei singoli fogli è presente per la Regione Friuli Venezia Giulia. Attendo progetti specifici per ampliare la gereferenziazione per singolo foglio per altre parti del territorio italiano. Cxf_in carica la trasformazione globale (trasformazione di datum) e se la trova successivamente applica i parametri di correzione al singolo foglio L'applicativo per la trasformazione è già pronto. Tale procedura necessita dei fogli catastali vettorilai. Per avere informazioni non esitate a scrivermi. Per informazioni scrivere a saccon@gisplan.it

pyqgis_plugin.name: Flow Trace
pyqgis_plugin.description: Select line segments upstream of a selected line segment
pyqgis_plugin.about: This Plugin will select all upstream polyline segments starting from a selected line segment. The only data you need to supply is a layer with polyline segments and a selected feature from the layer. If no segments are selected then you have connectivity issues with your data. It will select the upstream node based on the digitized direction.

pyqgis_plugin.name: QTiles
pyqgis_plugin.description: Generate map tiles from a QGIS project
pyqgis_plugin.about: Generates raster tiles from QGIS project for selected zoom levels and tile naming conventions (Slippy Map or TMS). Package tiles for NextGIS Mobile, GeoPaparazzi, simple Leaflet-based viewer or MBTiles. Developed by NextGIS. Any feedback is welcome at https://nextgis.com/contact

pyqgis_plugin.name: Animove
pyqgis_plugin.description: AniMove for QGIS
pyqgis_plugin.about: MCP and Kernel functions for UD. Randomization of home ranges and animal paths within a study area. Supported by Faunalia, Giuseppe Puddu (Ente Monti Cimini - RN Lago di Vico), Marco Zaccaroni (Department of Biology, University of Firenze), Prof. António Mira (University of Évora, Portugal, Unidade de Biologia da Conservação), Dr. Rosana Peixoto PhD, Dimitris Poursanidis, Giovanni Manghi, Stefano Anile, WildCRU (University of Oxford) and Julia Hazel. Developed by Francesco Boccacci, Víctor González, Alexander Bruy, and Matteo Ghetta for Faunalia (https://www.faunalia.eu/).

pyqgis_plugin.name: Geospatial Simulation
pyqgis_plugin.description: Geospatial tool for managing point-based simulation models
pyqgis_plugin.about: Geospatial tool for managing point-based simulation models

pyqgis_plugin.name: Plain Geometry Editor
pyqgis_plugin.description: Edit geometry of features using plain text (WKT, WKB)

pyqgis_plugin.name: TMS for Korea
pyqgis_plugin.description: QGIS plugin. Kakao(Daum), Naver, VWorld, NGII Map Layers for Korean users
pyqgis_plugin.about: QGIS plugin. Kakao(Daum), Naver, VWorld, NGII Map Layers for Korean users

pyqgis_plugin.name: Kuwahara Filter
pyqgis_plugin.description: Applies Kuwahara Filter
pyqgis_plugin.about: Applies Kuwahara Filter
pyqgis_plugin.author_name: Caio Hamamura - Laboratorio de Silvicultura Urbana - Universidade de Sao Paulo (campus de Piracicaba)

pyqgis_plugin.name: Semi-Automatic Classification Plugin
pyqgis_plugin.description: The Semi-Automatic Classification Plugin (SCP) allows for the supervised classification of remote sensing images, providing tools for the download, the preprocessing and postprocessing of images.
pyqgis_plugin.about: Developed by Luca Congedo, the Semi-Automatic Classification Plugin (SCP) allows for the supervised classification of remote sensing images, providing tools for the download, the preprocessing and postprocessing of images. Search and download is available for Landsat, Sentinel-2 images. Several algorithms are available for the land cover classification. This plugin requires the installation of Remotior Sensus, GDAL, OGR, Numpy, SciPy, and Matplotlib. For more information please visit https://fromgistors.blogspot.com .
pyqgis_plugin.tags: raster,analysis,landsat,land cover,landscape,classification,remote sensing,processing,mask,accuracy,clip,spectral signature,supervised classification,sentinel,random forest,copernicus,remotior sensus

pyqgis_plugin.name: Multipart Split
pyqgis_plugin.description: Split selected multipart features during edit session
pyqgis_plugin.about: The plugins adds a "Splits feature(s) parts" item to the Edit menu, and a similar button in the Advanced digitizing toolbar. The buttons are only enabled when the current layer is in edit mode and has features selected.

pyqgis_plugin.name: Distribution Map Generator
pyqgis_plugin.description: A QGIS plugin to batch create distribution maps from point data.
pyqgis_plugin.about: This QGIS plugin generates a series of distribution maps based on a layer of point localities. It uses a chosen field in the localities attribute table to select matching features, and intersects that with a separate vector layer which contains the grid polygons (these could be provinces, squares, or you could use the point layer itself to get point maps out). The selected points or polygons are then overlaid on the base map. Each distribution map is saved as a png file, with the unique identifier as a filename.

pyqgis_plugin.name: Shapefile Encoding Fixer
pyqgis_plugin.description: Fix broken encoding declaration in ESRI Shapefiles
pyqgis_plugin.about: Allows to display and overwrite encoding declaration stored in the LDID byte as well as a .CPG file, so you don't need to turn off the autodetection any more.

pyqgis_plugin.name: ZoomRC
pyqgis_plugin.description: Zoom to a Spanish Cadastre Reference
pyqgis_plugin.about: Zoom to a Spanish Cadastre Reference

pyqgis_plugin.name: qProf
pyqgis_plugin.description: Calculates height and slope profiles from DEM and GPX files, and plots geological attitudes and traces on profiles.
pyqgis_plugin.about: qProf is a plugin for the generation of topographic and geological profiles. Topography can be extracted from DEM or GPX files. Geological data, such as stratification attitude and geological traces, can be projected on the profile. Intersections between geological outcrops or faults can be determined.

pyqgis_plugin.name: bulkvectorexport
pyqgis_plugin.description: export vector layers to common format and crs
pyqgis_plugin.about: Export opened vector layers from the project to a common folder, format and CRS.

pyqgis_plugin.name: Data-Driven Input Mask
pyqgis_plugin.description: Opens a data-driven input mask for any PostgreSQL Layer
pyqgis_plugin.about: DataDrivenInputMask is a QGIS plugin that automagically creates input masks for PostgreSQL layers. All table constraints (notNull, foreign keys etc.) are taken into account. From this mask the user can edit any data contained in related tables, too (n-2m relations). The appearance of the mask (field names, field order, tabs, min and max values) is configurable in dedicated database tables. In addition to the input mask a search mask is provided with exactly the same layout as the input mask.

pyqgis_plugin.name: Contrast homogenizer
pyqgis_plugin.description: Applies the contrast enhancement parameters of the selected layer to all visible layers
pyqgis_plugin.about: Contrast Homogenizer allows to apply the contrast stretching of the current layer to all visible layers in QGIS. Likely to be useful when you open several adjacent images as QGIS enhances the contrast of each image independently based on their histogram. So the rendering is not homogeneous. This plugin allows to have this homogeneity on display. See README.md for more information.

pyqgis_plugin.name: Zoom To Postcode
pyqgis_plugin.description: Zoom the map extent to a UK postcode
pyqgis_plugin.about: Zoom the map canvas to a UK postcode.

pyqgis_plugin.name: Digitizing Tools
pyqgis_plugin.description: Subsumes different tools useful during digitizing sessions
pyqgis_plugin.about: DigitizingTools is meant to be a compilation of tools missing in basic QGIS, especially when digitizing on existing features. It is a collaborative effort and does not contain CAD like functions meant for construction.

pyqgis_plugin.name: OSM place search
pyqgis_plugin.description: Location search helper
pyqgis_plugin.about: Based on OSM data, Nominatim online tool (https://operations.osmfoundation.org/policies/nominatim/)
pyqgis_plugin.author_name: Xavier Culos (Agence de l'eau Adour Garonne)

pyqgis_plugin.name: LandXml import plugin
pyqgis_plugin.description: Import parcels and nodes from a LINZ LandXml file
pyqgis_plugin.about: The LandXml format is an Xml format used to transfer cadastral survey data. The format can describe cadastral survey parcels, nodes, and observations. This plugin is used to extract information from a LandXml data file into memory layers in the QGIS plugin. Currently it supports parcels and nodes, and observations. The plugin is designed to work with LandXml files generated by the Land Information New Zealand Landonline application - it may not support LandXml from other sources.

pyqgis_plugin.name: QChainage
pyqgis_plugin.description: This plugin takes line features and creates a new layer of points in provided distances on top of this Lines. Optionally you can set the startpoint (distance from the start of the line) and the endpoint (stop before reaching the end of the line) and automatically label the new points with the distances.
pyqgis_plugin.about: QChainage is either separating the selected (or all) Line-Features into parts, or linear referencing after a chosen distance. All along the whole Feature or between selectable start and endpoint.

pyqgis_plugin.name: VoGIS-ProfilTool
pyqgis_plugin.description: Create profiles from DEMs using vector geometries or a digitized line.
pyqgis_plugin.about: Create profiles from DEMs using vector geometries or a digitized line.

pyqgis_plugin.name: Copy_Coords
pyqgis_plugin.description: Capture map coordinates in ONE click to paste them into a spreadsheet
pyqgis_plugin.about: Capture coordinates from the map in exactly one click for immediate pasting into a spreadsheet, as simple as it gets. Use SHIFT to copy coordinates in EPSG:4326 (WGS 1984) independently from what your current CRS is. Developed by NextGIS. Any feedback is welcome at https://nextgis.com/contact

pyqgis_plugin.name: Send2GE
pyqgis_plugin.description: Sends current location to Google Earth
pyqgis_plugin.about: Grab current location and send it to Google Earth. Focus can be shifted to GE (default) or you can keep QGIS active if SHIFT is pressed (convenient when GE is on a different screen). Developed by NextGIS. Any feedback is welcome at https://nextgis.com/contact

pyqgis_plugin.name: Buffer by Percentage
pyqgis_plugin.description: Buffer polygon features so the buffered area is a specified percentage of the original area
pyqgis_plugin.about: Instead of buffering a polygon using a specified buffer distance, this plugin lets the user specify the area the buffered polygon should cover, as a percentage of the original polygon's area

pyqgis_plugin.name: pgRoutingLayer
pyqgis_plugin.description: Dockable widget that adds pgRouting layers
pyqgis_plugin.about: Dockable widget that adds pgRouting layers - pgr_astar pgr_astarCost - pgr_bdAstar pgr_astarCost - pgr_dijstra pgr_dijstraCost - pgr_bdDijstra pgr_bdDijstraCost - pgr_KSP
pyqgis_plugin.author_name: Anita Graser, Ko Nagase, Vicky Vergara, Cayetano Benavent, Aasheesh Tiwari

pyqgis_plugin.name: HTP Geoprocessor
pyqgis_plugin.description: Geospatial tool for geoprocessing HTP sensor data
pyqgis_plugin.about: Geospatial tool for geoprocessing high-throughput phenotyping sensor data

pyqgis_plugin.name: cadastre
pyqgis_plugin.description: This plugins helps users to use French land registry data, called Cadastre, in QGIS. It is only useful in France for people having access to Cadastre data. Funded by : the European Union, Fonds Européen de Développement Régional de Picardie, Conseil Régional de Picardie, Agence de Développement et d'Urbanisme du Grand Amienois.
pyqgis_plugin.about: This plugins helps users to use french land registry data, called Cadastre, in QGIS. It is only usefull in France for people having access to Cadastre data. Funded by : the European Union, Fonds Europeen de Developpement Regional de Picardie, Conseil Regional de Picardie, Agence de Developpement et d Urbanisme du Grand Amienois.

pyqgis_plugin.name: geopunt4Qgis
pyqgis_plugin.description: NL: Plugin om geopunt diensten in QGIS te gebruiken EN: Plug-in to use geopunt services in QGIS
pyqgis_plugin.about: NL: "Geopunt voor QGIS" is een plugin voor de QGIS open source desktop GIS, die de webservices van het Vlaamse geoportaal Geopunt ontsluit naar desktop GIS-gebruikers. Het Vlaamse Geoportaal Geopunt biedt een aantal geografische diensten (web-services) aan die mogen gebruikt worden door derden zoals andere overheden en bedrijven. - Zoeken op adres [gewoon, in batch en prikken op kaart] op basis van Gebouwen- en Adressenregister Vlaanderen. - Zoeken naar intressepunten in geopunt - Hoogte Profielen tekenen - Zoeken naar percelen - Zoeken naar Lagen in datavindplaats EN: "Geopunt for QGIS" is a plugin for the QGIS open source desktop GIS, which opens the web services of the Flemish geoportal Geopunt to desktop GIS users. The Flemish Geoportal Geopunt offers a number of geographic services (web services) that may be used by third parties such as other governments and companies. - Geocoding [regular, batch and reverse] based on adresregistry Flanders - Search for POI in geopunt - Draw elevation profiles - Search for Parcels - Search for layers in the datavindplaats

pyqgis_plugin.name: shptoobs
pyqgis_plugin.description: Converts shape files to RayMan input objectfiles (.obs) and/or loads .obs files as vector layers.
pyqgis_plugin.about: Transformation of shapefiles into object files for the use with the RayMan / SkyHelios model by a plugin for Quantum GIS

pyqgis_plugin.name: PPConverter
pyqgis_plugin.description: Convert PhoToPlan-images to GeoTIFFs
pyqgis_plugin.about: Convert PhoToPlan-images to GeoTIFFs

pyqgis_plugin.name: Qgis2threejs
pyqgis_plugin.description: 3D visualization powered by WebGL technology and three.js JavaScript library
pyqgis_plugin.about: This plugin visualizes DEM and vector data in 3D on web browsers. You can build various kinds of 3D objects and generate files for web publishing in simple procedure. In addition, you can save the 3D model in glTF format for 3DCG or 3D printing.

pyqgis_plugin.name: Video Uav Tracker
pyqgis_plugin.description: Replay a video in sync with a gps track displayed on the map (3d OPTIONS with 'panda3d' module installed)
pyqgis_plugin.about: see README file in repository for instructions and details

pyqgis_plugin.name: realcentroid
pyqgis_plugin.description: Create internal point for a polygon layer
pyqgis_plugin.about: Creates an internal ponts of a polygon layer into a new point layer. Attriburtes are copied too.

pyqgis_plugin.name: KLIC Viewer
pyqgis_plugin.description: View the result of a B4Udig request of the Netherlands to prevent damage
pyqgis_plugin.about: When you want to dig mechanically In the Netherlands you are obliged to request information on the area where you want to dig. The information on the network you receive can be viewed in QGIS. Information includes vector (IMKL with GML) + raster (PNG) + letters and detaildrawings (PDF).

pyqgis_plugin.name: simplereports
pyqgis_plugin.description: Simple report generator
pyqgis_plugin.about: Intersect a given area with layers and produce an OpenOffice ODT report. Developed by NextGIS. Any feedback is welcome at https://nextgis.com/contact

pyqgis_plugin.name: Visibility Analysis
pyqgis_plugin.description: Visibility analysis over raster DEM
pyqgis_plugin.about: Viewshed analysis calculates visible surface from a given observer point over a digital elevation model. Additionally, this plugin can be used for modelling intervisibilty networks between groups of points. It is particularly performant for multiple viewshed calculations form a set of fixed points.

pyqgis_plugin.name: Join multiple lines
pyqgis_plugin.description: Permanently join multiple lines
pyqgis_plugin.about: After selecting multiple features of a line layer, this plugin can merge them into one feature with a continuous line. The plugin will automatically put the selected lines in a geographically logical order and direction. If the end points of two lines do not match exactly, a line segment between both points is added to make the end result a single, continuous line. The attributes of the new line will be those of one of the selected features, but one cannot predict which one.

pyqgis_plugin.name: LRS
pyqgis_plugin.description: Linear reference system builder and editor
pyqgis_plugin.about: The plugin supports calibration, creation of punctual and linear events and calculation of measures for points
pyqgis_plugin.author_name: Radim Blazek, Simon South, Christophe Damour

pyqgis_plugin.name: Spline
pyqgis_plugin.description: Splines digitizing tool (spline = a chain of lines). Comes with a Processing algorithm for converting lines into splines.
pyqgis_plugin.about: A modified cubic Hermite spline interpolator is used to obtain continuous piecewise third-degree polynomials between knots (known spline points). Each piece is converted to a chain of lines which is then simplified with Douglas-Peuker algorithm. The Processing algorithm supports vertices' z and m values - they are interpolated linearly between knots.

pyqgis_plugin.name: SLD4raster
pyqgis_plugin.description: Generates SLD (Styled Layer Descriptor) for raster layers.
pyqgis_plugin.about: QGIS 3 plugin to generate SLD (Styled Layer Descriptor) for raster layers. Also it can transform SLD documents to QGIS Layer Style File (*.qgs). It supports multiband, singleband pseudocolor, gradient (white to black, black to white) styles also color interpolation type and opacity levels. Integrated with GeoServer Rest API. Provides direct upload of the styles.

pyqgis_plugin.name: OpeNoise Map
pyqgis_plugin.description: opeNoise allows to compute the noise level generated by point source or by road source at fixed receiver points and buildings.
pyqgis_plugin.about: The plugin allows to compute the noise level generated by point source or by road source at fixed receiver points and buildings. Please consider the following condition: - geometrical divergence - atmospheric absorption ISO 9613-1 - pure diffraction without ground effects, for horizontal and vertical obstacles - modelization is 3D
pyqgis_plugin.author_name: Arpa Piemonte (developer Stefano Masera - porting Pierluigi De Rosa)

pyqgis_plugin.name: go2streetview
pyqgis_plugin.description: a plugin for Google Street View interaction within QGIS
pyqgis_plugin.about: Go2streetview allows to get a Google Street View frame clicking and dragging the cursor on map to set location and direction of the desired view. Features: Automatic SRS conversion, Transparent proxying, View position on map, Take Snapshots of current view, Dockable Dialog Windows, Overlay info layer support, Map follows Streetview, Streetview service coverage, Digitize on Street View

pyqgis_plugin.name: Attribute painter
pyqgis_plugin.description: Plugin for easy replication of attributes values between features of the same or even different layer
pyqgis_plugin.about:
Attribute Painter usage: 1) Click on "Pick source feature" and select a sample feature on map. 2) On the table below will appears a selection list for attributes to be applied. 3) Check the attributes to be copied. 4) If necessary override source attributes values editing cells 5) If necessary remap destination field between those available in field combobox 6) Select destination features 7) Click on "Apply to selection" to apply attributes to selected features" or 6) Click on "Pick to Apply" to apply attributes to features one by one otherwise 8) Click "Reset source" to clear source selection
Attributes settings are now persistent changing between layers

pyqgis_plugin.name: Street View
pyqgis_plugin.description: Street View
pyqgis_plugin.about: Streetview allows you to open a web page with the Google Street View that highlights the part you have identified with two points (the base and target points) The target point is identified by dragging the base point

pyqgis_plugin.name: CalcArea
pyqgis_plugin.description: this plugin calculates the area of a polygon while it's being created or edited
pyqgis_plugin.about: this plugin calculates the area of a polygon while it's being created or edited

pyqgis_plugin.name: Vgi2Shp
pyqgis_plugin.description: Slovak cadastral VGI file format to ESRI SHP file format converter, for Slovak users only
pyqgis_plugin.about:
Vgi2Shp, verzia 3.0.7 pre QGIS 3: Hardverove poziadavky: pripojenie na Internet Softverove poziadavky: QGIS verzia 3.30.x a nizsia
Co je nove: Verzia 3.0.7: -free licencia platna do 31.12.2023 -zjednotenie hlavicky atributovych tabuliek pre atributy VYM, DRP, UMP, PRP, SPN a DRV Verzia 3.0.6: -free licencia platna do 31.12.2023 Verzia 3.0.5: -spracovanie VGI suborov grafickych udajov projektu pozemkovych uprav aj v DEMO verzii Verzia 3.0.4: -spracovanie VGI suborov grafickych udajov projektu pozemkovych uprav, ktorych nazov je v tvare: XXXXXX_UQ_EEEEEE_YYY_OOOOOO_cccc_pp.VGI a v ktorych nazve sa musia minimalne nachadzat nasledujuce dve polozky: 1. XXXXXX - sestmiestne cislo katastralneho uzemia v intervale 800015 az 992160 2. OOOOOO - skratka obsahu (BPEJ, BPP, GCZU, GCHNU, JPRL, MAHP, MFUU, MMUSES, MPPU, MPV, MRPS, MSVP, MSVZO, NDP, OPm, PUUO a UNP) Urad geodezie, kartografie a katastra Slovenskej republiky a MPRV SR Vykonavanie geodetickych cinnosti pre projekt pozemkovych uprav v ramci operatu obvodu Docasny metodicky navod, c.PP/2021/001265-1, Bratislava, 11. februara 2021 Verzia 3.0.3: -rozsirenie poloziek atributovych tabuliek vrstiev KLADPAR resp. UOV o pravne dokumenty, ktore su uvedene na LV (1-Tarchy,2-Ine udaje,3-Poznamky a 4-Titul nadobudnutia). Z dovodu velkosti vysledneho DBF suboru je uvedenych len prvych 8 pravnych dokumentov pre kazdy zaznam na LV, kazdy o dlzke max.256 znakov. Verzia 3.0.2: -podpora kodovania CP1250 (Windows Central and Eastern Europe) SPI suborov -spracovanie suborov BJ*.VGI -rozsirenie poloziek atributovych tabuliek vrstiev KLADPAR resp. UOV Verzia 3.0.1: -mnohonasobne zrychlenie -sucasna spracovanie viac ako jedneho VGI suboru -vytvaranie adresarovej struktury Kraj - Okres - Kataster -takmer 100-percentna ucinnost spracovania
Popis vrstiev: KLADPAR,UOV - parcely katastra nehnutelnosti, register C resp. E ZAPPAR - vnutorna kresba parciel ZNACKY - mapove znacky okrem znaciek kultur POPIS - nazvoslovie (sidelne a nesidelne nazvy) LINIE - dalsie prvky polohopisu KATUZ - hranica katastralneho uzemia ZUOB - hranica zastavaneho uzemia obce TARCHY - tarchy na parcelach
Popis atributovej tabulky vrstvy KLADPAR resp. UOV: 1.Spracovanie len SGI suborov - VGI subory: - Objekt, cislo objektu - Vrstva, vrstva objektu - KU, kod katastra - Nazov_KU, nazov katastra - Parcis, parcelne cislo - textovy udaj vo formate 123456.012 - CPA, parcelne cislo - ciselny udaj vo formate 1234560120 - Parcela, parcelne cislo - textovy udaj vo formate 123456/12 2.Spracovanie SGI suborov spolocne s SPI subormi - VGI a DBF subory v spolocnom adresari: a.SPI subory - PA*.DBF resp. EP*.DBF: - VYM, vymera parcely v m2 - DRP, druh pozemku - PKK_PA, sposob vyuzitia pozemku - DN1_PA az DN8_PA, druh chranenej nehnutelnosti - UMP, umiestnenie pozemku - PRP, prislusnost pozemku k PPF alebo LPF - SPN, spolocna nehnutelnost - DRV, druh pravneho vztahu b.SPI subory - CS*.DBF: - DRS_CS, druh stavby - PKK_CS, popis stavby - PEC_CS, supisne cislo - MSS_CS, miestna cast - VYM_CS, vymera stavby na pozemku - ZCS_CS, zjednocovacie cislo stavby - UMS_CS, umiestnenie stavby - DON_CS, druh chranenej nehnutelnosti c.SPI subory - PK*.DBF: - PKU, kod povodneho katastra - Nazov_PKU, nazov povodneho katastra d.SPI subory - BP*.DBF a VL*.DBF: - BNP_BP, bytovy/nebytovy priestor - CIV_BP, oznacenie vchodu - CIP_BP, cislo poschodia - CIB_BP, cislo bytu / kod nebytoveho priestoru - CNP_BP, popis priestoru - VYM_BP, uzitkova plocha bytu / nebytoveho priestoru - CLV_VL, cislo listu vlastnictva - PCS_VL, poradove cislo spoluvlastnika - VLA_VL, meno, nazov a adresa alebo sidlo vlastnika - PRI_VL, priezvisko - MNO_VL, meno - ROD_VL, rodne meno - TIP_VL, titul - KPV_VL, typ identifikatora - ICO_VL, ICO alebo rodne cislo, datum narodenia obcana - PCZ_VL, poradove cislo zavodu - PRV_VL, priezvisko (BSM) - MEV_VL, meno (BSM) - ROV_VL, rodne meno (BSM) - TIZ_VL, titul (BSM) - RCI_VL, rodne cislo alebo datum narodenia ucastnika (BSM) - ULC_VL, adresa - ulica - CPO_VL, adresa - supisne cislo - MST_VL, adresa - mesto - PSC_VL, adresa - PSC - DOP_VL, doplnkovy udaj - STT_VL, adresa - stat - TUC_VL, ucastnik pravneho vztahu - TVL_VL, typ vlastnika - DRU_VL, druh ucastnika pravneho vztahu - CIT_VL, vlastnicky podiel - citatel - MEN_VL, vlastnicky podiel - menovatel - CIT_BP, vlastnicky podiel - citatel - MEN_BP, vlastnicky podiel - menovatel - VLA_Podiel, vlastnicky podiel v m2 e.SPI subory - PV*.DBF a PV*.FPT: - PZ1_PV az PZ8_PV, informacia o pravnych dokumentoch f.SPI subory - UZ*.DBF (neaktualizovane od 1.1.2005, udaje len informativneho charakteru): - CEL_UZ, cislo evidencneho listu - UZI_UZ, nazov uzivatela - SEK_UZ, druh vlastnictva - SEK_Popis, upresnenie druhu vlastnictva

pyqgis_plugin.name: EasyCustomLabeling
pyqgis_plugin.description: Allows to quickly duplicate layer into memory layer ready for data defined labeling. Requires Memory layer Saver >= 3.2 to restore all labels correctly BUT it is currently not yet available to QGIS 3
pyqgis_plugin.about: EasyCustomLabeling is a plugin for QGIS, designed to simplify the work for manual and data defined labeling. The tool duplicates a data vector layer into a new memory layer made of lines, adds all necessary fields for advanced custom labeling like label location, rotation, color, font, callout, alignements. The resulting layer is activated ready to use labeling tools. Data is saved in Memory Layer provider, which means it is NOT saved to a file or a database. To make thoses layers persistent, please install Memory Layer Saver v3.2 or higher plugin, that saves all memory layers to a qdatastream file along the project named myqgisprojectname.qgs.mldata.

pyqgis_plugin.name: Area Along Vector
pyqgis_plugin.description: Create an area along a vector depending on a field value. Right and left sides can be distinguished.
pyqgis_plugin.about: This plugin draws rectangle areas along polylines according to field values. It was developed in order to show car traffic volumes on a road network.

pyqgis_plugin.name: Station Lines
pyqgis_plugin.description: Create lines along polylines with some parameters (length, side, angle). It assumes a cartesian coordinate system
pyqgis_plugin.about: Add an algorithm to create transects at a fixed distance

pyqgis_plugin.name: Click-Fu
pyqgis_plugin.description: Send click coordinates to various geoservices
pyqgis_plugin.about: Send click coordinates to various geoservices to open their maps in a browser at needed location. Developed by NextGIS. Any feedback is welcome at https://nextgis.com/contact

pyqgis_plugin.name: postgisQueryBuilder
pyqgis_plugin.description: User friendly postgis query generation. Tutorial on website.
pyqgis_plugin.about: The postgisQueryBuilder QGis plugin is aimed to to provide a friendly environment to perform spatial analysis in postgresql/postgis without having to deal with SQL code. It is not intented to replace the Qgis built-in DBManager that have a wide usage that covers all aspects of Qgis/Postgis interaction. It can be used in educational environments for a live analysis of the structure of the common spatial queries. The plugin can manage postgresql views and can be used for deploying spatial analysis frameworks based on chains of spatial relations.

pyqgis_plugin.name: IDECanarias
pyqgis_plugin.description: The plugin allows you to search all locations of Canary Islands.
pyqgis_plugin.about: The plugin allows you to search all locations of Canary Islands, Spain

pyqgis_plugin.name: Stream Feature Extractor
pyqgis_plugin.description: A tool to extract features from a stream network.
pyqgis_plugin.about: A QGIS plugin to extract stream features (wells, sinks, confluences etc.) from a stream network.

pyqgis_plugin.name: Vector Bender
pyqgis_plugin.description: Does to vectors what georefencers does to raster. This feature is also known as "rubber sheeting".
pyqgis_plugin.about: Does to vectors what georefencers does to raster. This feature is also known as "rubber sheeting".

pyqgis_plugin.name: interlis
pyqgis_plugin.description: Interlis Import/Export
pyqgis_plugin.about: Load Interlis data into QGIS layer and import/export functionality for PostGIS. Contains a GUI and Processing algorithms for additional tasks requiring a Java.

pyqgis_plugin.name: SG Diagram Downloader
pyqgis_plugin.description: A tool for QGIS that will download SG (South African Surveyor General) diagrams.
pyqgis_plugin.about: Sponsored by Kirchhoff Surveyors

pyqgis_plugin.name: autoSaver
pyqgis_plugin.description: auto save current project and modified layers in edit mode at specified interval
pyqgis_plugin.about: The plugin provide a basic autosave functionality for project file and modified layers currently in edit mode. Currents edits can be saved as version files if layerVersion plugin is installed.

pyqgis_plugin.name: Zoom to Paste
pyqgis_plugin.description: Zoom to a specified point on the map from the Clipboard comma delimited

pyqgis_plugin.name: SVG2ColoR
pyqgis_plugin.description: Generates color-ramp styles from SVG files. It also compatible with CPT-CITY styles. SVG2ColoR improves your color-ramp library, by the way your maps look better.
pyqgis_plugin.about: Generates color-ramp styles from SVG files. It also compatible with CPT-CITY styles. SVG2ColoR improves your color-ramp library, by the way your maps look better.

pyqgis_plugin.name: Clipper
pyqgis_plugin.description: This plugin lets you use clipping function in the same shapefile selecting a line or polygon as a clipping/cutting feature and then clips/splits all overlaying features
pyqgis_plugin.about: Clipper plugin for Qgis 3.x 2021 © Giuseppe De Marco The clipper plugin is a python plugins that performs a missing feature of current (3.x ) Qgis Version: clipping of features inside the same shapefile from a selected feature (line or polygon). Polygon clipping from a selected polygon features clips all intersecting features and returns clipped…

pyqgis_plugin.name: Constraint Checker
pyqgis_plugin.description: Generate reports of constraints (e.g. planning constraints) applicable to an area of interest.
pyqgis_plugin.about: Generate reports of constraints (e.g. planning constraints) applicable to an area of interest.
pyqgis_plugin.author_name: Lutra Consulting for Dartmoor National Park Authority

pyqgis_plugin.name: PointConnector
pyqgis_plugin.description: Creating lines between points following a from-to list.
pyqgis_plugin.about: Creating lines between points following a from-to list. The points can be read from a shape-file or a point-layer in the QGIS document. The list can be in a csv-file or a table in the document.

pyqgis_plugin.name: Maps Printer
pyqgis_plugin.description: Export several print layouts to pdf, svg or image file (jpg, tif, png...) format in one click, from the current project or from projects in a folder.
pyqgis_plugin.about: Exporting a print layout requires to open it, launch the export, wait till it finishes. This procedure can become boring, repulsive and time consuming when you have to export a lot of print layouts. Maps Printer offers a quick way to export print layouts, without opening each one before: just check them in a list and launch their export to the file format you wish (pdf, svg, jpg, tif, png...). Furthermore, you can export print layouts from project files within a directory.
pyqgis_plugin.author_name: Harrissou Sant-anna (Conseil d'Architecture, d'Urbanisme et de l'Environnement du Maine-et-Loire)

pyqgis_plugin.name: QuickOSM
pyqgis_plugin.description: Download OSM data thanks to the Overpass API. You can also open local OSM or PBF files. A special parser, on top of OGR, is used to let you see all OSM keys available.
pyqgis_plugin.about: Execute customs Overpass queries in QGIS to get OSM data.

pyqgis_plugin.name: norGIS ALKIS-Einbindung
pyqgis_plugin.description: This plugin is dealing with German cadastre data (therefore not localized)
pyqgis_plugin.about: QGIS-Erweiterung zur ALKIS-Einbindung Funktion: * Einbinden von durch norGIS ALKIS-Import vorbereitete Datenbanken. * Einbinden in QGIS * Export von UMN-Mapfiles (optional, erfordert python-mapscript) * Signaturierung nach GeoInfoDok * Eigentümerabfrage (Einzelabfragen) * Client für norGIS Liegenschaftsbuch

pyqgis_plugin.name: Shortcut Manager
pyqgis_plugin.description: A shortcuts toolbar to run external programs
pyqgis_plugin.about: Create a shortcuts toolbar to run external programs and open web pages. Developed by NextGIS. Any feedback is welcome at https://nextgis.com/contact

pyqgis_plugin.name: ArcheoCAD
pyqgis_plugin.description: Generates a vectorial layer of Polygons, Rectangles, Circles and Ellipses using vertices.
pyqgis_plugin.about: This plugin is developed on the demand of INRAP archaelogists and topographers and it is in particular adapted for archaeological field survey.

pyqgis_plugin.name: Dissolve with stats
pyqgis_plugin.description: Group entities with same value for one field, calculate statistics on the other fields
pyqgis_plugin.about: Choose a layer and a field for this layer. This plugin will merge all entities with the same value for this field, and can calculate statistics for each remaining field : min, max, sum, count, mean, median, standard deviation, first, last, concatenation and uniquification. Uniquification concatenate all values from a field without any duplicate. For example, from a polygon layer of provinces, with a country ID field and a population field, you can create a country layer with the sum of the population of its provinces for each country.

pyqgis_plugin.name: OpenQuake Integrated Risk Modelling Toolkit
pyqgis_plugin.description: Tools to drive the OpenQuake Engine, to develop composite indicators and integrate them with physical risk estimations, and to predict building recovery times following an earthquake
pyqgis_plugin.about: This plugin allows users to drive OpenQuake Engine calculations (https://github.com/gem/oq-engine) of physical hazard and risk, and to load the corresponding outputs as QGIS layers. For those outputs, data visualization tools are provided. The toolkit also enables users to develop composite indicators to measure and quantify social characteristics, and combine them with estimates of human or infrastructure loss. A post-earthquake recovery modeling framework is incorporated into the toolkit, to produce building level and/or community level recovery functions.

pyqgis_plugin.name: NNJoin
pyqgis_plugin.description: Nearest neighbour join. Join vector layers based on nearest neighbour relationships.
pyqgis_plugin.about: The NNPlugin joins two vector layers (the input and the join layer) based on nearest neighbour relationships. All geometry type combinations are supported. A feature from the input layer is joined to the nearest feature in the join layer. The result of the join is a new vector layer with the same geometry type and coordinate reference system as the input layer. Joining layers with different Coordinate Reference Systems (CRS) is supported, as long as the join layer coordinate system is a projected CRS. The join and distance calculations is performed using the join layer CRS. Self joins are supported. For self joins, each feature in the layer is joined to its nearest neighbour within the layer. A spatial index (QgsSpatialIndex) on the join layer is used to speed up the join for layers with non-multi-geometry types.

pyqgis_plugin.name: Swap Vector Direction
pyqgis_plugin.description: Swap Vector Direction reverse the direction of a vector Fr : SwapVectorDirection permet d'inverser la direction d'un vecteur
pyqgis_plugin.about: This plugin allows to reverse the direction of a vector in a row or multi-row. Fr : Ce plugin permet d'inverser la direction d'un vecteur dans une couche ligne ou multiligne.

pyqgis_plugin.name: Azimuth and Distance Calculator
pyqgis_plugin.description: Calculates azimuths and distances for a selected feature. The feature can be either a line or a polygon. The plugin also calculates Meridian Convergence and Kappa Factor for UTM projections to a given geographical coordinate.
pyqgis_plugin.about: Azimuth and Distance Calculator Version generates: - Memorial descritivo - Memorial sintético - Selo da planta - Planilha de áreas e perímetros

pyqgis_plugin.name: Temporal/Spectral Profile Tool
pyqgis_plugin.description: Plots profile from raster bands. Based on Profile Tool.
pyqgis_plugin.about:
A QGIS plugin for interactive plotting of temporal or spectral information stored in multi-band rasters. Based on Profile tool plugin.
After installation and activation the plugin can be accessed either from main menu (under Plugins > Profile Tool > Temporal/Spectral Profile) or from an icon on the taskbar.
This plugin was initially developed under the TIGER-NET project (www.tiger-net.org) funded by the European Space Agency (ESA) and currently is part of GlobWetland Africa Toolbox (http://globwetland-africa.org) also funded by ESA. Copyright (C) 2020 DHI-GRAS A/S (http://www.dhi-gras.com).
The plugin contains Python nc-time-axis package. See https://github.com/SciTools/nc-time-axis for license and details.

pyqgis_plugin.name: pickLayer
pyqgis_plugin.description: pick to feature on map canvas to perform layer and feature commands
pyqgis_plugin.about: The plugin allows to perform layer and features operations by a contextual menu clicking over features on map canvas. This is useful when many layers are loaded in the project and is difficult to find them in a crowded legend.
pyqgis_plugin.author_name: Enrico Ferreguti (github.com - enricofer), National Land Survey of Finland

pyqgis_plugin.name: Multiple Layer Selection
pyqgis_plugin.description: Allow the selection/deselection of features of multiple layers
pyqgis_plugin.about: Allow the selection/deselection of features of multiple layers

pyqgis_plugin.name: WCPS datacube query
pyqgis_plugin.description: Query datacubes with WCPS and display results.
pyqgis_plugin.about: This plugin allows sending datacube queries as per OGC Web Coverage Processing Service (WCPS) to a server and displaying the results. WCPS allows zero-coding spatial and temporal analytics; see <a href="https://earthserver.eu">this tutorial</a>, <a href="https://www.ogc.org/standard/wcps/">the standard</a>, and the <a href="https://myogc.org/go/coveragesDWG">OGC datacubes info page</a>.<br><br>A user guide for the plugin itself can be found <a href="https://doc.rasdaman.org/11_cheatsheets.html#wcps-qgis-plugin">here</a>.
pyqgis_plugin.author_name: Nikita Ivlev, Dimitar Misev, Bang Pham Huu

pyqgis_plugin.name: VectorMCDA
pyqgis_plugin.description: Performs geographic multi-criteria decision making. Plugin is now deprecated, the MCDA functions are all implemented and extended in SSAM plugin
pyqgis_plugin.about: VectorMCDA is a QGIS plugin that uses different MCDA algorithms to perform a multicriteria analysis in a geographic environmental

pyqgis_plugin.name: ProfileFromPoints
pyqgis_plugin.description: Plots profile or cross section of survey points
pyqgis_plugin.about: This plugin is designed to station point data (e.g. topography data) and plot it along a centerline. Point data will be plotted using an existing or plugin generated centerline by the shapely library.

pyqgis_plugin.name: TomBio tools
pyqgis_plugin.description: FSC QGIS Plugin for biological recorders.
pyqgis_plugin.about: This is a plugin for QGIS desktop GIS which is aimed primarily at biological recorders. It streamlines many of the tasks commonly required from GIS by biological recorders including viewing NBN maps (via the NBN WMS), displaying biological records from CSV files, working with UK OS grid references and registering raster map images from the internet. Although originally designed for use in the the UK, enhancements have been made to improved utility in any geographical context.

pyqgis_plugin.name: Networks
pyqgis_plugin.description: Designed as a processing algorithm provider. Manage linear networks and compute multimodal routing and accessibility. Several functionalities as generating a graph from a linear layer, invert and split polylines, and connect point to a linear objects, and perform a linear-based deterministic interpolation for accessibility maps and build isochrones polygons.Computes multimodal routing and accessibility. Include a dataset for testing,a Musliw documentation and an algorithm for detecting non connected nodes
pyqgis_plugin.about: Networks algorithm provider. Manage linear networks. Several functionalities as generating a graph from a linear layer, reverting and splitting polylines, connecting points to a linear objects, performing a linear-based deterministic interpolation for accessibility maps and generating isochrons polygons. The purpose of the plguin is also to deal with the multimodal calculator tool Musliw (manage input ou output files). Compute multimodal routing and accessibility with extern Musliw tool provided, which can be called by the Musliw computation algorithm in QGis

pyqgis_plugin.name: refFunctions
pyqgis_plugin.description:
new analytycal and spatial referencing functions for Field Calculator
The plugin is outdated as of QGIS 3.14 due to the introduction of the new functions for geometry overlay expressions
pyqgis_plugin.about: Plugin that add custom user functions to Qgis Field calculator for referencing, analitically or spatially, between layers, For example retrieving a value from a layer using as a field value or a spatial condition (intersects, disjoint ....) as parameter v1.2 Code cleanup and dbvaluebyid() is unable to return $geometry issue fixed (courtesy of @SzieberthAdam https://github.com/SzieberthAdam) v1.3 New intersecting_geom_count and intersecting_geom_sum functions and migration code to QGIS3 (courtesy of @patricev https://github.com/patricev) v1.4 intersecting_geom_count/sum issue fixed (courtesy of @nantodevison https://github.com/enricofer/refFunctions/issues/11) v1.5 dbquery dbvalue dbnearest issues fixed v1.6 added equaling_geom_count function (courtesy of https://github.com/jaitor1), added functions within, overlapping to geom_count and geom_sum(https://github.com/patricev), api break to 3.4

pyqgis_plugin.name: Processing Workflows
pyqgis_plugin.description: A plugin that adds workflow functionality to Processing.
pyqgis_plugin.about:
Plugin for QGIS Processing Toolbox for creating processing workflows and workflow collections. Workflows provide step-by-step instructions and guidance for less experienced users thus facilitating capacity building in Earth observation data analysis and GIS tasks.
This plugin is part of the Water Observation Information System (WOIS) developed under the TIGER-NET project and GlobWetland Toolbox developed under the GlobWetland Agrica project. Both projects were funded by the European Space Agency as part of a long-term initiative aiming at promoting the use of Earth Observation (EO) for improved Integrated Water Resources Management (IWRM) and environmental monitoring and reporting in Africa. Copyright (C) 2014-2018 DHI GRAS (www.dhi-gras.com)

pyqgis_plugin.name: MBTiles images extract
pyqgis_plugin.description: With this QGIS plugin you can take an MBTiles file and extract all the tiles as images to a local folder. This plugin can be very useful for debugging processes.
pyqgis_plugin.about: With this QGIS plugin you can take an MBTiles file and extract all the tiles as images to a local folder.

pyqgis_plugin.name: Clip to Hemisphere
pyqgis_plugin.description: Clip vector layers to the hemisphere of the earth centered on a user specified point in order to use them in an orthographic projection without introducing artefacts.
pyqgis_plugin.about: When projecting data to the orthographic projection, features that cross the horizon can lead to unsightly artifacts. By clipping the data to the hemisphere that will be visible in the orthographic projection, these artifacts can be avoided. This plugin for the QGIS Processing framework takes a vector layer and a latitude and longitude for the center of the hemisphere and clips the vector layer accordingly. The plugin takes care of special cases such as a hemisphere centered on the equator or on one of the poles.

pyqgis_plugin.name: Redistricting for QGIS
pyqgis_plugin.description: Electorate Redistricting and Equalisation
pyqgis_plugin.about: Redistricting and electoral equalisation tool. Features simultaneous equalisation of state and parliamentary electorates, metrics and a recommendation engine.

pyqgis_plugin.name: Concave Hull
pyqgis_plugin.description: Computes a concave hull containing a set of features
pyqgis_plugin.about: Computes a minimum area containing a set of features. The concave hull is supposed to best describe that area occupied by the given set of points. The resulting polygon geometries are stored in an existing polygon layer or new memory layer. Prior computation of the hull the given data can optionally be divided into clusters.

pyqgis_plugin.name: QuickMapServices
pyqgis_plugin.description: Easy to add basemaps and geoservices
pyqgis_plugin.about: Easy to use list of services and search for finding datasets and basemaps. Please contribute new services via https://qms.nextgis.com. Developed by NextGIS. Any feedback is welcome at https://nextgis.com/contact

pyqgis_plugin.name: Survey design plugin
pyqgis_plugin.description: A plugin to design biomass surveys along coast lines. The survey design dialog can be opened under Survey -> Survey design. Developed for NIWA, New Zealand
pyqgis_plugin.about: A plugin to design biomass surveys along coast lines. The survey design dialog can be opened under Survey -> Survey design. Developed for NIWA, New Zealand
pyqgis_plugin.author_name: National Institute of Water and Atmospheric Research (NIWA)

pyqgis_plugin.name: SCP-Plugin
pyqgis_plugin.description: Plugin for Structured Conservation Planning of Marine Protected Areas
pyqgis_plugin.about: Plugin for Structured Conservation Planning of Marine Protected Areas

pyqgis_plugin.name: Multi-distance buffer
pyqgis_plugin.description: Create multiple distance buffers
pyqgis_plugin.about: The Multi-Distance Buffer plugin creates a multi-distance buffer vector layer from an input vector layer and a set of distances. The result layer consists of bands (donut type) of regions according to the buffer distances provided. If 100 and 200 are provided as distances, the result layer will consist of two bands - one will contain all areas that are within 100 units from the geometries of the input vector layer, the other will contain all areas that are from 100 to 200 units from the geometries of the input vector layer. The user can choose to only buffer around selected features. Negative buffer distances are allowed for polygon layers.

pyqgis_plugin.name: Feature Grid Creator
pyqgis_plugin.description: This plugin creates a grid of features, following a line or filling a polygon.
pyqgis_plugin.about: This plugin creates a grid of features, usable to fill a plot with a grid of boreholes for example. It can fill polygon(s) or follow line(s) with points (boreholes) or rectangles (trenches) in either a square or diamond order. You can also create code/numbers for the holes by hovering over them.

pyqgis_plugin.name: OS Translator II
pyqgis_plugin.description: A plugin for loading Ordnance Survey Products.
pyqgis_plugin.about: OS Translator II makes loading GML-based datasets into PostGIS easy. It also performs a number of post-processing tasks on the data such as adding additional fields for styling and downloading 3rd-party stylesheets.
pyqgis_plugin.tags: postgis,load,import,convert,gml,topography layer,mastermap,gz,ordnance survey,translate,os,gml gz,master map,gml.gz,postgresql,itn,sites layer,address layer 2,loader,integrated transport network,pg,addresslayer2,address layer,schema 9,schema 7

pyqgis_plugin.name: PostGIS geoprocessing tools
pyqgis_plugin.description: A set of tools to do geoprocessing with PostGIS layers. The spatial SQL queries are run in the server where the layers come from, and the result will be a PostGIS layer (created directly in the server where the inputs come from) and not a shapefile as usually in the Processing toolbox. The plugin is experimental and in the future it will benefit from a number of improvements that will be made in the QGIS Processing toolbox.
pyqgis_plugin.about: Developed by Alexander Bruy and Manghi for NaturalGIS (http://www.naturalgis.pt/)

pyqgis_plugin.name: Instant Print
pyqgis_plugin.description: Instantly print map excerpts
pyqgis_plugin.about: The instant print plugin allows to quickly print map excerpts to a file, utilizing an existing composer as page layout.

pyqgis_plugin.name: NTv2 Datum Transformations
pyqgis_plugin.description: NTv2 Datum Transformations for the QGIS Processing toolbox. This plugin is directly derived from https://github.com/qgispt/processing_pttransform originally developed by Alexander Bruy, Pedro Venâncio and NaturalGIS (http://www.naturalgis.pt/), with the support of the Portuguese QGIS user group (http://www.qgis.pt/).
pyqgis_plugin.about: Developed by Alexander Bruy and Manghi for NaturalGIS (http://www.naturalgis.pt/)

pyqgis_plugin.name: xyToPoint
pyqgis_plugin.description: this plugin creates a point layer based on tabular coordinates
pyqgis_plugin.about: this plugin creates a point layer based on tabular coordinates

pyqgis_plugin.name: Indicatrix mapper
pyqgis_plugin.description: The plugin uses constant radius ellipsoidal caps (calculated by Vincenty's formulae) instead of the original infinitesimal small Tissot circles. These caps are able to transform on the fly from a reference ellipsoid to a selected project coordinate reference system. The user can study the distortions of the caps in a blink, such conclusions can be drawn as the projection is conformal or equal-area.
pyqgis_plugin.about: The extent and resolution of the caps and the graticule are able to define. The segments refers to the preciseness of the geometrical elements. The radius parameter means the magnitude of projecting caps, it can be given in kilometer or degree dimension. In case of adding more layers untick the 'Simplify geometry' option at the Rendering tab of layer properties. QGIS contains approximately 2700 categorized projections, you can test the effects of the projections for your Country as well. Check the homepage or look after 'QGIS Map Projections' tutorial video by BME FMT on YouTube for further detail.

pyqgis_plugin.name: DSG Tools
pyqgis_plugin.description: Brazilian Army Cartographic Production Tools
pyqgis_plugin.about:
DSGTools with the following features: -Creation, Storage and Deletion of PostGIS servers configurations -Database creation using Spatialite and PostGIS according to EDGV version 2.1.3 and 3.0 (cadaster) -Layer loading by category and class as defined by EDGV version 2.1.3 and EDGV version 3.0 (cadaster) -Manipulation of complex features (Creation, Editing, Deletion, Zoom, Association, Disassociation) and -Access to some WM(T)S services provided by BDGEx. -Inventory Tool for all geospatial data supported by GDAL/OGR. -Tool to install Models and Script (geoalgorithms) in the Processing Toolbox (HSV fusion script available). -Database role management. Access profile (i.e. Read/Write permissions by table in database ). -Database user profile management (e.g. Grant/Revoke predifined roles to/from user ). -Create/Remove PostgreSQL users. -Alter PostgreSQL user Password. -Conversion tools between postgis and spatialite EDGV databases. -Tool to assign elevation values to contour lines in a simple way. -EDGV code list viewer to aid attributes queries using our EDGV databases. -Drop EDGV databases -Remove missing databases from qsettings -Tool to reclassify features (move them to another layer) with predefined attributes Requirements for LINUX (Ubuntu/Debian):
Install the following packages as follows: sudo apt-get install libqt5sql5-psql sudo apt-get install libqt5sql5-sqlite

pyqgis_plugin.name: Catalog on the fly
pyqgis_plugin.description: Automatically adds images that are in the catalog layer that intersect with the map area.
pyqgis_plugin.about:
This plugin work with catalog layer. Catalog layer need be have the geometry type of polygon and have a field, the image address(type string), and optionaly can be have a field with the date of image. The field, image address, can be a local files or WEB address. The WEB address need be a XML of type GDAL_WMS(https://gdal.org/drivers/raster/wms.html)
This plugin is developed on the demand of IBAMA(Brazilian Institute of Environment and Renewable Natural Resources) http://www.ibama.gov.br

pyqgis_plugin.name: beePen
pyqgis_plugin.description: Allows to draw freehand lines in a layer
pyqgis_plugin.about: Plugin for drawing freehand lines with map-specified pen widths. Its applications are for field mapping. It is based on the "Freehand" plugin.

pyqgis_plugin.name: OSMDownloader
pyqgis_plugin.description: Plugin to download OSM data by area, using a selection by rectangle. The plugin can also automatically load the osm file into QGIS in a transparent way.
pyqgis_plugin.about: Plugin to download OSM data using threads with a simple area selection. It can automatically load downloaded *.osm files as QGIS layers.

pyqgis_plugin.name: Line direction histogram
pyqgis_plugin.description: Create a histogram (rose diagram) of line directions
pyqgis_plugin.about: Visualises the distribution of line segment directions as a rose diagram (weighted using the line segment lengths). Can save the rose diagram as CSV, PDF or SVG.

pyqgis_plugin.name: Locate points along lines
pyqgis_plugin.description: Creating points along lines
pyqgis_plugin.about: Creating points along lines with given offset and interval

pyqgis_plugin.name: IPyConsole
pyqgis_plugin.description: IPython QGIS Console
pyqgis_plugin.about: This plugin adds a Python console based on IPython. IPython has full introspection support and TAB completion, syntax highlight, online help ad a lot of cool features you will love! Optionally, this plugin creates more "pythonic" interface to Qgs classmethods for an easier introspection and TAB completion of Qgs classes. Note: you must separately install IPython and IPython Qt console to use this plugin. On a Debian-like distributions this is as easy as running "pip install 'ipython[all]==3.1.0 qtconsole' or (better) "pip install jupyter==1.0.0 qtconsole". To install packages with 'pip' you may need root/admin privileges.

pyqgis_plugin.name: ReconstructLine
pyqgis_plugin.description: Reconstruct linear features from unordered points
pyqgis_plugin.about: Reconstruct linear features from points. Points can be unordered (mixed) time-wise, only spatial location of points is considered. This is NOT a simple 'connect the dots as they are in the table' mechanism (for that – check Points2One plugin). Developed by NextGIS. Any feedback is welcome at https://nextgis.com/contact

pyqgis_plugin.name: qgis2web
pyqgis_plugin.description: Export to an OpenLayers/Leaflet webmap
pyqgis_plugin.about:
QGIS plugin to export your project to an OpenLayers or Leaflet webmap. It replicates as many aspects of the project as it can, including layers, extent and styles (including categorized and graduated). No server-side software required.
Please consider a small donation at https://www.opengis.it/buy-me-a-coffee/ Even a modest "virtual coffee" can help support our commitment to providing quality software. As a token of our gratitude, donors will receive as a gift qgis2opengis (a plugin enhancing OpenLayers export of qgis2web).
Happy mapping!
pyqgis_plugin.author_name: Andrea Ordonselli, Tom Chadwin, Riccardo Klinger, Victor Olaya, Nyall Dawson

pyqgis_plugin.name: PostNAS Suchfunktionen
pyqgis_plugin.description: Searchfunction for PostNAS Database
pyqgis_plugin.about: This plugin can search parcels in a PostNAS database. The concept of this plugin is a single field search like google. So you can search substrings of the parcel identifier. After finding the parcel will be highlighted in the map.

pyqgis_plugin.name: Load QSS - UI themes
pyqgis_plugin.description: Configure look and feel for Qgis

pyqgis_plugin.name: Thin greyscale image to skeleton
pyqgis_plugin.description: Thin a greyscale image to a skeleton
pyqgis_plugin.about: The Thin Greyscale plugin will thin a greyscale image to a greyscale skeleton image, given a set of levels. For multiband images, the band to be thinned can be specified. Integer and decimal bands are supported.

pyqgis_plugin.name: Magnetic Declination
pyqgis_plugin.description: Calculates the magnetic heading from a true geographic heading and vice versa.
pyqgis_plugin.about: Uses the NOAA National Geophysical Data Center, epoch 2020 data. The World Magnetic Model (WMM) are accurate to within 30 minutes of arc for D and I and about 200 nanoTesla for the intensity elements.

pyqgis_plugin.name: Red Layer
pyqgis_plugin.description: quick georeferenced sketches and annotations
pyqgis_plugin.about: A qgis plugin for sketching and drawing on map canvas. It is intended for quick annotations and field use. Sketches can be drawn in different colors and widths and can be converted in memory layer if needed. The sketches are stored in the project directory in a separate .sketch txt file that can be shared with other users.

pyqgis_plugin.name: DataExplorer: Data Analysis and Visualization
pyqgis_plugin.description: Calculate and show statistical properties for a field
pyqgis_plugin.about: Data Explorer is aimed at plotting and/or analysing data series, with particular emphasis on time series. The plugin structure has been partially inspired by the plugin

pyqgis_plugin.name: Clip Multiple Layers
pyqgis_plugin.description: Clip all displayed layers (rasters and vectors) with a polygon layer selected.
pyqgis_plugin.about: Clip all displayed layers (rasters and vectors) with a polygon layer selected.

pyqgis_plugin.name: Layer Board
pyqgis_plugin.description: View and edit vector and raster properties for the project layers in a table
pyqgis_plugin.about: This plugin helps to see and modify properties for vector and raster layers. It shows the layers in a table sheet, and the user can directly modify some properties such as layer name, title, abstract, minimum and maximum scales. Some actions can be performed on multiple layers at once, such as modifying spatial reference system and scale based visibility. The layers information can be exported to Comma Separated Values (CSV).

pyqgis_plugin.name: Spreadsheet Layers
pyqgis_plugin.description: Load layers from spreadsheet files (*.ods, *.xls, *.xlsx)
pyqgis_plugin.about: This plugin adds a "Add spreadsheet layer" entry in "Layer" / "Add new Layer" menu and a corresponding button in the "Layers" toolbar. These two links open the same dialog to load a layer from a spreadsheet file (*.ods, *.xls, *.xlsx) with some options (use header at first line, ignore some rows and optionally load geometry from x and y fields). When this dialog is accepted, it creates a new GDAL VRT file in same folder as the source data file and layer name, expanded with a .vrt suffix which is loaded into QGIS using OGR VRT driver. When reusing the same file twice, the dialog loads its values from the existing .vrt file. No need to install additional dependencies.

pyqgis_plugin.name: Customize ToolBars
pyqgis_plugin.description: Create customs Toolbars for Qgis.
pyqgis_plugin.about: This plugin allows to create personalized tools, with the buttons the user desires. It is only necessary dragging from the list on the left and dropping in the list on the right, the tools that the user desires to add to any of the previously created toolbars.

pyqgis_plugin.name: Toggle Active Layer
pyqgis_plugin.description: Plugin for toggle visibility of active layer
pyqgis_plugin.about: This plugin is a tool for toggle visibility of active layer, for example, you can see the difference with others layers below, when pressed and released. This plugin is developed on the demand of IBAMA(Brazilian Institute of Environment and Renewable Natural Resources) http://www.ibama.gov.br

pyqgis_plugin.name: MongoConnector
pyqgis_plugin.description: QGIS plugin to add geospatial data from mongodb database.
pyqgis_plugin.about: This plugin allows you to add collection from mongodb as layer in QGIS. It requires pymongo>=3.0 python plugin for mongodb access ($pip install pymongo). Layer from mongodb collection is created in memory and named after collection (with some random numbers). As for now save to database is not supported. Please report bugs and suggestions on github issues tracker. To use it just click connect button. Choose database and collection. Finally Mark if geometry is like in geojson or pick proper field with geometry. If geojson-style than all the geometry types are supported otherwise points / lines geometries only. Other data in collection are added as feature attributes. Data in "properties" field can be used as data if key was found. See examples for details.

pyqgis_plugin.name: Space Syntax Toolkit
pyqgis_plugin.description: Collection of tools for space syntax analysis workflows in a GIS environment.
pyqgis_plugin.about: The “Space Syntax Toolkit” is a QGIS plug-in offering user friendly space syntax analysis workflows in a GIS environment.
